item.title: Daemon hell in Jenkins
item.description:
Recently I wrote a Linux like initd script to start/stop my web application. The script works well when running it in shell of linux. The web application will run in background by daemon. However I found both daemon and web application(java) exited immediately if I started the script in Jenkins as a shell step of build process. I put below simple script in 'Execute shell' block, 12daemon --name=test-daemon -- sleep 200sleep 60 The process 'daemon' and 'sleep 200' should exit after 200 seconds the 'sleep' exits.
